title: 2D Transforms
desc: 2D transforms in CSS let you manipulate elements using functions like translate(), rotate(), scale() and skew(). These changes affect the element's position, size, and angle in two-dimensional space.

title: 3D Transforms
desc: 3D transforms allow elements to move in three-dimensional space using functions like rotateX(), rotateY() and translateZ(). This adds depth and perspective to your elements.
